text: about the business of ascension without drawing the attention of the Serres priesthood, and also permitted easy access through the Inner Earth to Giza, Thebes, Jerusalem and the city of Ur along the Euphrates River. Using surface travel, these locations were hundreds of miles apart, but through the portals of Inner Earth these locations could be accessed within minutes. Akhenaton’s purpose in coming to Earth was to ensure the opening the Halls of Amenti, to realign the morphogenetic field of the Annu races so they could be re-entered into the Sphere of Amenti, and to orchestrate ascension for the Templar-Annu, Annu-Melchizedeks and selected others of various races, whose genetic codes were evolved enough to undergo this process.
